Package com.xebisco.yield.engine

Class YldEngineAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.xebisco.yield.engine.YldEngineAction
  • public class YldEngineAction
extends java.lang.Object
    It's a wrapper for a YldAction that contains information about whether it should be repeated, and an id
